# renderValue

**Instance Property**

Returns the render value for the tracking area.

## Declaration

```swift
var renderValue: LayerRenderer.Drawable.TrackingArea.RenderValue { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the returned value in the render pass of [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_drawable_get_tracking_areas_texture] for the pixel value of the tracking area identifier.
title: renderValue
